data.name: Jester Street : Card Counting Trainer
data.detailed_description:
Ever wondered if you could Count Cards? I did too, so I created this game to assist; by providing ALL the data you would need, at runtime.

Take control of the Game: Pause, Resume, see all Previous Cards, their Card Count Value, the Running & True Count; all in order to 'keep the count' -providing an advantage to the Player, when to bet BIGGER!.

The game of Blackjack will (generally) consist of various Decks, & knowing the current Running Count will enable you to calculate these better strategic betting points. See Utilities below for more info.

Card Counting Systems;


  • NEW: KO (Knock Out) : Running Count, Only (Unbalanced) Introduced: 31.03.22
  • Hi-Lo : Running Count & True Count (Balanced)

Blackjack, Play;


  • Bet ($5, $10, $25, $50 Chips), Split, Double, Stand, Hit, Insurance
  • 2No. Static BOT's (Adding some difficulty to Player Counting)
  • Visual Arm Betting Animations (Hit, Stand, Split, Double)

Utilities;


  • How to Card Count Interactive Screen (New Update)
  • Session(s) Record : With Win/Loss Counts
  • Complete Game Card Listing/Viewing [Toggable]
  • Pause (End of hand) Play [Toggable]
  • Music Player
  • True Count Chart (Trendline)
  • Touch Screen P.C/Settings
  • Basic Strategy Chart (Illuminated Play, based on current hand)
  • Advanced Play's (Deviations) Chart (Illuminated Play, based on current hand)
  • Card Count Values [Visibility Toggleable]

The Simulator 2100;


Run hundreds, if not thousands of Blackjack games;

  • ...using Basic Strategy & *Adv. Deviations (*Toggleable)
  • Set Custom Bet Amounts, Per True Count (-1 to +17)
  • Set Custom Deals Per Hour/Hours Played
  • Set Custom Starting Funds
  • Set Custom Deck Penetrations

Deck(s);


  • Choose: 1 to 8 decks. (6, as default -as most Casinos).

Customizable;


  • Game Mode
  • Table Felt
  • Arm Interactive Colour
  • Card Outline Colour
  • Room/Table: Light Controls
  • Mini-Shop Buy Items (a WIP)

data.short_description: Welcome to Jester Street, England. Hidden from sight, a small laundrette holds a large secret; a unique, card counting machine, intended to help tip the balance into the 'common' Player's odds. Avid Players drop in to perfect their Blackjack: timings, counts, and bet amounts.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i5 - 2500k
  • Graphics: 2GB+
  • Storage: 600 MB available space

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Jester Street : Card Counting Trainer
